name: Genius Bobar
description:
============

Hi，this is a game jam project developed in 48 hours. In this game, two players need to collaborate with each other to fix the phone.

There are known usability issues, please read the instruction carefully in game.

If you still encounter with problems, please refers as follows:

- For the opening phone step, two players need to press the use tool button at the correct timing together (when the phone shell moves up)

- For the repairing step, press hold tool button to grab the tool, and press use tool button at the same time to interract with repairing point.

============

这是一个gamejam中48小时完成的小游戏作品，在游戏中，两名玩家需要合理修好一个手机。

由于开发时间限制，已知有很多usability问题，请详细阅读游戏内教程后再开始游戏。

如果依旧遇到了任何问题，请查阅以下：

- 在开手机壳的步骤中，需要两名玩家同时按“use tool”键，且在正确时间点（盖子掀起）按键。

- 在开盖后修理步骤中，按住“hold tool”键以握住工具，移到需要修理的点上时同时再点击“use tool”键位以进行操作。
